subject: Re: this damned protection debate--Bruce
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
FS:

Fantastic comment you made: "It's just something that doesn't want 
you to wake up."  That is right on in my opinion...if they can create 
fear in a person, then they can manipulate that person.  Fear is the 
doorway to losing power and control.  

Think about the playground bully who takes people's lunch money until 
a kid half his size calls his bluff by smacking him in the mouth. ;)

LC
